page.title: 02RADSTOCK AND DISTRICT.
page.content:
farmland,the major landcover is
enclosed rough grazing.The other half of our D.Block is residential and commercial areas. There are many games to play,that are played at home and at school,like skipping.There are different games for skipping like:on the mountain,under and over,vote vote,I'm a little bumper car,etc.Some people play active sports like:tennis,football and cricket or sometimes they play spectator sports like:squash,table tennis and netball. In one part of our D.Block,Radstock, we have traffic problems,because we did have traffic lights,but it is now being to two mini roundabouts.There is now hardly any pedestrian crossings, which are now making pedestrians angry,and that is why it is harder to cross the road.
